name: followers
title: follower page tweaks
description: tweaks to the followers page. may take several minutes to fetch all of your followers if you have a lot.

count.name: show follower count
count.tooltip: shows your follower count on the follower page. enable at your own discretion.

loadAll.name: load all followers
loadAll.tooltip: adds a button that allows loading every page of your followers at once

download.name: download follower list
download.tooltip: downloads your follower list after fetching it
